metadata.description: *GASP!* *CHOKE!* It's back! The legendary EC Comics series returns with all-new stories from some of the top writers and artists in comics. Brought to you by those gruesome creeps, the Crypt Keeper, the Vault Keeper, and the Old Witch, these page-turning terrors are oozing with spooky thrills and eerie chills.
metadata.name: Tales From the Crypt
